General.Name: Jinpu Landscape Architecture Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Jinpu Landscape Architecture Co. Ltd. offers landscaping services in China. The company offers landscape design, engineering, construction, and maintenance services; integrated design and construction services; and garden engineering construction services. It also engages in the planning, construction, planting, and maintenance of seedlings and flowers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Nanjig, China.
